name: Green Coconut and Grapefruit Shaved Ice
description: Making shaved ice using this technique is incredibly easy.
recipeIngredient: 24 ounces fresh or canned green coconut water
8 ounces grapefruit juice, ideally fresh squeezed

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all three ingredients in a bowl until the sugar dissolves. Pour into a flat, shallow tray and freeze.
When frozen, use a metal spoon, to scrape the ice into a light, fluffy snowy texture. Serve immediately, garnished with a little honey or macerated grapefruit segments.
